page.title: 05HOME LIFE
page.content: {Kitchens.} We think that the kitchen is the most important part of the house. As well as family meals that are made there, it is the room where Mums spend a lot of time.Most of our class have a lot of equipment in their family kitchens.As well as cookers, fridges,kettles,mixers and washing machines a lot of households now have microwave cookers . {Mealtimes} During the week families do not eat many of their meals together. Sunday is the best day of the week for most of us,this is because there is more time to enjoy the meal and most of the family is together. {Leisure.} Most people today have a television and radio.More people now own video and homecomputers.
